page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
Both Dringhouses and Woodthorpe are residential areas therefore residents have few means of entertainment and must go the four miles into York for theatre, dance hall, cinema and main restaurants. There is not a lot to do at night but there is a large swimming pool,the{ {Edmund Wilson Baths,} and an indoor bowls club opposite the baths. There are open areas where football and outdoor games can be played. There is a childrens play area beside the shops on the village green and a small football pitch in Woodthorpe.
The York racecourse is a popular meeting place for regular horse racing. It has at least twenty five meetings a year and has been visited in recent years by Her Majesty the Queen.
